title: Emerging Challenges and Issues Peer to Peer Cryptocurrency Payment System with Special focus on Bitcoin
venue: International Journal of Languages, Education and Social Sciences
abstract: With growing of e-commerce business globally it becomes extremely important to come up with new methods of online payments. Cryptocurrency can be explored as one such solution as it runs through some very complex mathematical formulas that make it secure and inherits the features that exist in a currency. The paper discusses the mechanism and issues involved with cryptocurrency with special focus on bitcoin
